World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 20 日星期六 03:28:10 GMT 120
Fire in school dorm in China kills 13A fire in a dormitory at a school in central China has killed 13 people and injured another, Chinese state media reported on Saturday. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 02:11:09 GMT SQVMLFEEMBJAJDTE6ZUDOQTIDY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/fire-school-dorm-china-kills-13-2024-01-20/Reuters世界中国
Western Australia on 'extreme' heatwave alert, raising bushfire riskParts of Western Australia on Saturday were set to swelter through an "extreme" heatwave, raising the risk of bushfires in the vast state, the nation's weather forecaster said. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 00:57:18 GMT GGAIXFEIUJIDVET7JYO6CN3Z7U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/western-australia-extreme-heatwave-alert-raise-bushfire-risk-2024-01-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
Fire in Panama's largest landfill blows toxic smoke over capitalA large blaze at a garbage dump outside Panama City blew a toxic smoke in the country's capital on Friday, forcing evacuations as firefighters battled to put out the flames that authorities said were likely caused by arson the night before. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:37:50 GMT GADNCLB73FNJHJ2IM6K5DOF5HA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/fire-panamas-largest-landfill-blows-有毒-烟-over-capital-2024-01-19/Reuters世界美洲
Biden hopeful for bipartisan package in Senate on U.S.-Mexico border next weekPresident Joe Biden signaled on Friday that he is hopeful a deal over the U.S.-Mexico border could be worked out next week at least in the Democratic-controlled Senate, and said he was ready to embrace "massive changes." Fri, 19 Jan 2024 22:01:08 GMT WYTW3YF7BBI7VDM3GYQNCXVAC4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/biden-hopeful-bipartisan-package-senate-us-mexico-border-next-week-2024-01-19/Andrea Shalal, Katharine Jackson世界美洲
Ethnic killings in one Sudan city left up to 15,000 dead - UN reportBetween 10,000 and 15,000 people were killed in one city in Sudan's West Darfur region last year in ethnic violence by the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) and allied Arab militia, according to a United Nations report seen by Reuters on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 21:54:28 GMT SX3KGKDGDJLZRFIH27UCFVO4II https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ethnic-killings-one-sudan-city-left-up-15000-dead-un-reported-2024-01-19/Michelle Nichols, Maggie Michael世界非洲
Army called in to rescue about 600 Spanish motorists stuck in snowArmy units were mobilised to help about 600 drivers who were stuck on a motorway in heavy snow as Storm Juan blanketed many parts of Spain, authorities said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 21:53:04 GMT YPL3MZ3FT5MLRFHIL2CRBPJZYQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/army- Called-rescue-about-600-spanish-motorists-stuck-in-snow-2024-01-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Jordan's PM urges US to take lead in ending Gaza "carnage"The United States and other top powers need to use their influence with Israel to end the ongoing "carnage" in Gaza, Jordan's Prime Minister, Bisher al Khasawaneh, said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 21:00:37 GMT NT6GPVE5QRPYJHLF3CHSBWBID4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/jordan-pm-urges-us-to-take-lead-ending-gaza-carnage-2024-01-19/Marc Jones世界中东地区
US Democrats push Biden administration over civilian toll in Israel's Gaza campaignDozens of President Joe Biden's fellow Democrats signed a letter on Friday urging his administration to reaffirm that the U.S. strongly opposes "the forced and permanent displacement" of Palestinians from Gaza. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 20:53:12 GMT 4JJYFTCEFNO3XK372QR7RHU5QU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-democrats-push-biden-over-civilian-toll-israeli-gaza-campaign-2024-01-19/Patricia Zengerle世界
Three French police officers given suspended jail terms for excessive force during 2017 arrestThree French police officers were handed suspended jail sentences for using excessive force during the 2017 arrest of a young Black man, a French court ruled on Friday, sparking protests outside the courtroom calling for police officers to serve time in prison. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 20:22:49 GMT U3PA3TDURNN5XLCEHSFV7E2LPU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Three-french-police-officers-given-suspended-jail-terms-for-excessive-force-during-2024-01-19/Layli Foroudi, Juliette Jabkhiro世界欧洲
US conducts strikes against 3 Houthi anti-ship missilesU.S. Central Command forces on Friday conducted strikes against three Houthi anti-ship missiles that were aimed into the Southern Red Sea and were prepared to launch, the U.S. military said on X, formerly called Twitter. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 20:19:01 GMT DAT54E3B5BMW5PN6KMDOZSN4XE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-conducted- Three-strikes-against-houthi-targets-friday-white-house-2024-01-19/Andrea Shalal, Kanishka Singh世界中东地区
Palestinian-American teenager killed by Israeli forces in West Bank- Palestinian officialsA Palestinian-American teenager was killed by Israeli security forces on Friday in the occupied West Bank, Palestinian health officials said. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 19:30:31 GMT XW3RSVUBDVIX7GQX26FNXX3UBE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/palestinian-american-teenager-killed-by-israeli-forces-west-bank-palestinian-2024-01-19/Reuters世界中东地区
